price: Donne-leur comme exemple les habitants de la cité, quand leur vinrent les Envoyés .
arabic: وَٱضۡرِبۡ لَهُم مَّثَلًا أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡقَرۡيَةِ إِذۡ جَآءَهَا ٱلۡمُرۡسَلُونَ
footnotes: [761] La cité: Antioche. Les envoyés: les apôtres de Jésus.

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-iḍ'rib lahum mathalan aṣḥāba al-qaryati idh jāahā al-mur'salūna
